title: Luna Lola: The Moon Wolf
author: Park Kara
description:
"You're the moon wolf, Lola. You're the wolf with the power of the Moon goddess", Serena said, and collective gasps were heard in the room.
***
After being rejected by her mate in the Moonlit pack, Lola escaped on a full moon only to enter the territory of the next Alpha King, who also happened to be her second-chance mate.

title: The Viking's Mate Hunt
author: Maria Elise
description:
"Little bunny, little bunny. Wolf is HUNGRY!" the voice taunted me, followed by an evil cackle.
"Run, rabbit. RUN!" 
A monstrous bellow boomed through the night sky and crashed into my soul like a sledgehammer. I could feel a chill sweeping across my body and my heart pounding in my chest. The echoes of howls and laughter followed me from behind ...  More

title: The Omega’s Awakening
author: Dee Gleem
description:
I am the Omega of my pack, and the Alpha's son was supposed to be my mate. He didn't know it because he hasn't reached 18 yet. But I couldn't stand the sight of him being with someone else. So, I ran away.

I am the Omega of my pack, but little do they know what I am capable of...

title: Shy
author: TashaPageWriting
description:
"She's shy," Brooke shrugged, glancing at Indianna, who looked like she wanted to be anywhere but in the classroom.
"Well, come on, I don't bite," Greyson urged, and Indianna stiffened, just like before.
"Don't talk about that," Indianna said, her voice was still quiet but firm.

author: L.T.Marshall
description:
Fate, bloodlines, and betrayal collide in a world where Lycans, vampires, and ancient enemies battle for dominance. At the heart of it all is Alora Dennison—an orphaned wolf with a cursed legacy—whose Awakening binds her to the one mate she never wanted, and thrusts her into a destiny that could unite the packs… or destroy them.

description: After enduring a lifetime of hatred and rejection due to a past mistake, Lady Rihanna, the daughter of the Beta, made a fateful decision to leave the Black Hills behind. title: The 5-Time Rejected Gamma and the Lycan King
author: Stina's Pen
description:
She's his bonded mate - yet she wants nothing to do with him.
After 5 failed mate-bonds, she’ll do anything to escape another heartbreak…

Gamma Lucianne learns that her prayers to the Moon Goddess were ignored, and she’s being bonded once more. But this time, she’s not giving an inch—even offering the lycan king a chance to reject her on their ...  More

title: Sold to the Heartless CEO

description: Michelle Finley, a stripper who endured working in hell to pay off her father's debt, thought that her life would turn normal after the last night of working after-hours. title: Alpha's Sex Slave
author: Maureen Elochukwu
description:
In a world where Alphas take what they want, the Alpha’s Sex Slave series follows five women bound by fates they never chose. From brutal bargains to forbidden love, each story reveals a battle between pain and passion, power and surrender—and the dangerous hope of freedom.

Book 1: Alpha's Sex Slave

***

He extended a hand, using it to wipe the tears that lay on her cheeks. Seeing them there didn't sit right with him. She was supposed to be writhing in pleasure, not crying in pain.

title: True Luna
author: Tessa Lilly
description:
"I, Logan Carter, Alpha of the Crescent Moon Pack, reject you, Emma Parker of the Crescent Moon Pack."

I could feel my heart breaking. Leon was howling inside me, and I could feel his pain. 
She was looking right at me, and I could see the pain in her eyes, but she refused to show it. Most wolves fall to their knees from pain. I wanted to fall ...  More

author: Genikatrina

At the age of 23, Belle Miller decides to lose her virginity to a stranger she met in an app named 'Sex Mate.' After her one-night stand with Ben, she hopes not to see him again, but fate intervenes and leads her to him again.

To Belle's surprise, she discovers that her mysterious lover is none other than the renowned billionaire Ben Larkson, an...  More

title: Alpha King: Stubborn Mate
author: Omaisabella
description:
Hell can't hold him, demons can't stop him, gods can't scare him, and love? Ha, love can't bind him. Jason, the Millennium Wolf Prince, rules the supernatural school with fear and authority, his alpha presence commanding obedience from all.

But when Rae, a mysterious new student, arrives, everything changes. Rae, unaware of her true heritage as ...  More

description:
"Mate," my wolf Jax bellowed when he first saw the 10-year-old girl hiding behind my Beta's legs. I couldn't believe my ears, I'm no pervert, but how could a pup be my mate? But Jax was determined. Little Mercedes of the Silver Moon pack is the little Luna of our pack.

After Alpha Zane of Midnight Moon convinced her parents and the Alpha of Silv...  More

title: The Alpha King's Breeder
author: ID Johnson
description:
Alpha King Maddox nips at my ear. "Do you like that, little flower?" 
I moan in answer as his other hand slides my nightgown down off of my shoulder so his mouth comes down on me, his tongue lapping at my sensitive skin. 

***

I'm just his breeder, traded for a debt. But can I convince King Maddox I could be more—so much more?

His pack is the most feared and powerful in the region, but the only thing this alpha wants is to find his mate. When he thinks he has lost hope, she, the woman he has waited so long for, appears and becomes a problem. Megan is his mate, but her age does not play in her favor. By the stan...  More

Maxine had a single dream—to be mated to a respectable and powerful Alpha. She was madly in love with Alpha Gerald, her father's successor. But at the age of 18, Maxine found herself unable to transform, embarrassing herself in front of everyone.

One by one, she faced rejection from all the Alphas, including Alpha Gerald, whose rejection stung h...  More
